summary: ValentineQuestionCard.tsx was updated to remove pig plushie imagery from the question card UI, but the diff also changes the No button label (not requested). The diff does not provide sufficient evidence to confirm that all pig plushie asset references were removed across the entire frontend codebase.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the pig plushie static image assets are no longer referenced anywhere in the frontend codebase after removal (project-wide zero references).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary only shows changes to ValentineQuestionCard.tsx and does not include evidence of a project-wide removal/search confirming zero remaining references in other files.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed the No button copy to "Maybe later..." (and thus altered user-facing text) on the question card.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states not to change the Yes/No button copy/behavior; the only requested change was removing pig plushie images.
